name: Boundless Possibilities
description: Madness is in the eye of the beholder! Or that is what Khan's mirror counterpart says. But if his experiments were too much for the Terran Empire, why is he allowed to conduct them here? Could he have a solution to the fissures - and anomaly crisis?
rules:
-- Unique Augments, Federation, and Terran Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Fissure Quest T'Pol, any version of Khan, La'an, K'Ehleyr, STT Originals, Displaced, Temporal Agents, or Mirror Universe crew will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Fissure Quest T'Pol, Khan, La'an, K'Ehleyr, STT Originals, Displaced, Temporal Agents, Mirror Universe
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Grimes
featured_crew.flavor: Baron Grimes, who made his fortune in arms dealing, was willing to pay handsomely for the capture of Harry Mudd, who had deceived his daughter and stolen her dowry.

action.name: I Would Do Anything For My Daughter

featured_crew.name: La'an
featured_crew.flavor: In an alternate timeline, La’an as commander of the U.S.S. Farragut is tasked with evacuating groups of survivors.

action.name: Am I Glad To See You

rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Grimes
rewards.flavor: Baron Grimes, who made his fortune in arms dealing, was willing to pay handsomely for the capture of Harry Mudd, who had deceived his daughter and stolen her dowry.

action.name: I Would Do Anything For My Daughter

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Chronitons

screens.text: "They say my experiments are unethical, even call me mad, but I am on the cusp of a grand discovery. Something that may even give me an answer on how to close the fissures...and the anomalies."
"Your past work was deemed dangerous and denied by even the brutal Terran Empire. Why should the denizens of this universe provide you a laboratory and resources?"

"Because my work is the best opportunity any faction has at putting an end to this. Scientists from your universe have already acknowledged my research. Or would you rather remain stubborn and watch the fissures tear the galaxy asunder?"

"He bears my face and yet I find it difficult to trust him. Or perhaps it is because of that fact. Still, Captain, I believe you should keep an eye on him. Perhaps his work holds the answers we need. Or he may be a greater threat than the fissures."
"They say my experiments are unethical, even call me mad, but I am on the cusp of a grand discovery. Something that may even give me an answer on how to close the fissures...and the anomalies."
"Your past work was deemed dangerous and denied by even the brutal Terran Empire. Why should the denizens of this universe provide you a laboratory and resources?"

"Because my work is the best opportunity any faction has at putting an end to this. Scientists from your universe have already acknowledged my research. Or would you rather remain stubborn and watch the fissures tear the galaxy asunder?"

"He bears my face and yet I find it difficult to trust him. Or perhaps it is because of that fact. Still, Captain, I believe you should keep an eye on him. Perhaps his work holds the answers we need. Or he may be a greater threat than the fissures."
